All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddBoatController
Class used to manage the addition of new boat graphical representations
AddCreditController
Class used to manage the addition of new boat credit card graphical representation
BoatController
Class that manages the interaction with the boat Objects
BoatStaffController
Class that manages the graphical visualization and interaction with the boat elements in the staff view
Connection
Class used to establish and manage the connection to the server
CreditController
Classes that manages the interaction with the credit cards objects in the user view
DashboardController
Class that defines and manages the interactions of the user with the client user interface
Main
This class contains the public static void main of the application
MyListener
This interface defines abstract methods that are defined in different classes, providing different functionalities to different parts of the application
MyListenerStaff
This interface defines abstract methods that are defined in different classes, providing different functionalities to different parts of the application
NotificationController
Class that manages the notification graphical element
SignInUpController
Controller Class of the login scene, also manages the interactions with the connected scenes.
StaffController
Class that manages the interactions with the staff visual interface
ThreadBoats
Class that creates a thread used to check for updates in the boat database
ThreadMember
Class that creates a thread used to check for updates in the member database
ThreadNotification
Class that creates a thread used to check for incoming notifications
ThreadPrix
Class that creates a thread used to check for updates in the races database
ThreadTransaction
Class that creates a thread used to check for updates in the transactions database
Utilities
This class provides utilities to the module, for example the ShowAlert method that takes as input title, header and content and produces an alert window
